> It would make a very interesting project too; you'd have to use lots 
of nifty algorithms and there would be lots of problem solving to be 
done.

Actually, it wouldn't be that hard if you know how to write 
information to a scenario file.  Most of it would be about processing 
commands which is really easy to do.
